title: Aoki Densetsu Shoot! (Blue Legend Shoot!)
synopsis: Inspired by Yoshiharu Kubo's phenomenal performance that led Kakegawa High School to a miraculous victory in a soccer tournament, Toshihiko Tanaka decides to enter the same school as his idol and join the soccer club, hoping to become as successful as Kubo.
characters: ['Kubo, Yoshiharu', 'Tanaka, Toshihiko', 'Hiramatsu, Kazuhiro', 'Shiraishi, Kenji', 'Endo, Kazumi', 'Kamiya, Atsushi', 'Nitta, Shinichi', 'Sasaki, Yutaka', 'Mahori, Keigo', 'Simon, Micky']
